attributes.action: Create an armed forces national holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Australia has Anzac day and rememberance day ............ 
Is there any reason that the UK cant have its own holiday to celebrate the memory troops of all services that have fallen in service to their country other than rememberance day.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
